import sys

def min_moves(a, k):
    a.sort()
    moves = 0
    i = 0
    j = len(a) - 1
    while i < j:
        if a[i] == a[i + 1]:
            i += 1
        elif a[j] == a[j - 1]:
            j -= 1
        elif a[i] + 1 < a[j]:
            a[i] += 1
            a[j] -= 1
            moves += 1
        else:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
    if len(set(a)) > 1:
        moves += len(a) - k
    return moves

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()) # n is the number of elements in the array a and k is the number of distinct elements
    a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split())) # array a
    print(min_moves(a, k))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def min_moves(a, k):
    a.sort()
    moves = 0
    i = 0; j = len(a) - 1
    while i < j: 
        if a[i] == a[i + 1]: i += 1
        elif a[j] == a[j - 1]: j -= 1
        elif a[i] + 1 < a[j]: 
            a[i] += 1; a[j] -= 1
            moves += 1
        else: i += 1; j -= 1
    if len(set(a)) > 1:
        moves += len(a) - k
    return moves

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split())
    a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    print(min_moves(a, k))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


n, k = map(int, input().split())

a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()
print(a)
moves = 0

if k == n:
    print(a[-1] - a[0])
else:
    while a[-1] - a[0] != 0:
        a[-1] -= 1
        a[0] += 1
        moves += 1
        print(a)
        a.sort()
    print(moves)

def minMoves(a, k):
    a.sort()
    moves = 0
    i = 0
    j = len(a) - 1
    while i < j:
        if a[i] == a[i + 1]:
            i += 1
        elif a[j] == a[j - 1]:
            j -= 1
        elif a[i] + 1 < a[j]:
            a[i] += 1
            a[j] -= 1
            moves += 1
        else:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
    if len(set(a)) > 1:
        moves += len(a) - k
    return moves

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split())

    a.sort()
    moves = 0
    i = 0
    j = len(a) - 1
    while i < j:
        if a[i] == a[i + 1]:
            i += 1
        elif a[j] == a[j - 1]:
            j -= 1
        elif a[i] + 1 < a[j]:
            a[i] += 1
            a[j] -= 1
            moves += 1
        else:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
    if len(set(a)) > 1:
        moves += len(a) - k

def main(): 
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    s = set(a)
    if len(s) == n:
        print(n - 1)
    else:
        print(n)
main()

import sys

def min_moves(a, k):
    a.sort()
    moves = 0
    i = 0
    j = len(a) - 1
    while i < j:
        if a[i] == a[i + 1]:
            i += 1
        elif a[j] == a[j - 1]:
            j -= 1
        elif a[i] + 1 < a[j]:
            a[i] += 1
            a[j] -= 1
            moves += 1
        else:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
    if len(set(a)) > 1:
        moves += len(a) - k
    return moves

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split())
    a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    print(min_moves(a, k))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n, k = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort()

moves = 0

if k == n:
    print(a[-1] - a[0])
else:
    while a[-1] != a[0]:
        a[-1] -= 1
        a[0] += 1
        moves += 1
        a.sort()
    print(moves)
